anar-keli nam manawikawage pathi wruththa bala mahimaya ketharam da yath, me sathya kriyawenma sadew lokadhipathi wu shakra dewendrayan wada wesen pandu kambhala shailasanaya rathwa giye, shakra dewendra pashchath bhagaya pilissi, "ka hata wipathak wi dayi" manu lo sisara balanne, sathya kriyawa daka, "me dhumendrayo nam uhuta haki samaye balawath pin kam kota atha...ma ma gos mu suwapath karamha" yayi sitha, shakra shriya walawambhigarayen wijrumbhanaya keremin aakasha thalayen "nawya wu lokayata"path wi, yahane asaranawa wada hoth dhumendrayange hisa siya hasthayen pirimada, ee hisa suwapath kota, emathu nowa, ehi kesha kalapayada pihituwa, dambaadiwehi suprakata sharuk khanayan sathuwu kes kalambaa paridi kes kelin situwa, "putha, dan nagi situwa..!...ee anar-keli nam wu manawikawage pathi wathehi bala mahimayen tha suwa kalemayi" yalith aakasha thalayata pana siya diwya bhawanata wanneya....ewita ee aathura wa siti dhumendrayo ninden pibidiyak se depayin sita gaththeya....
